content:
Kolega prodaja projekcijski TV, zelo lepo ohranjen, brezhiben. Cena cca. 600 evrov, ogled v Ljubljani, vse ostalo pa prosim na privat. Hvala.

Display
Chassis Type 	MG 2A
Visible diagonal 	55" (140cm)
Display technology 	three 7" large throat CRTs
Lenses 	Delta 79/78
Viewing angle 	Horizontal 160 degree
Brightness 	typical 1480 lux
Contrast 	150:1
Aspect ratio 	16:9
  	 
Reception
Tuning system 	PLL
Off air 	PAL B/G/I/D/K; SECAM B/G/D/K
A/V connections 	PAL, B/G/I/D/K; SECAM B/G/D/K; NTSC video playback
Channel selections 	VHF, UHF, S-Channels, Hyperband
Terr. Input 	75 Ohm (Coax)
  	 
Connections
Rear cabinet 	3 SCART
Cinch 	Audio out L/R, surround out Center channel high level input
Side Panel 	S-Video in, Cinch Video/Audio in,3.5 mm headphone mini-jack
  	 
Specifications
Mains 	220-240V
Power consumption 	310 watt (estimated)
Standby consumption 	1 watt
Dimensions: (W x H x D) 	1334 x 1395 x 765 mm
author: GSMobil
